data.name: WELCOME_TEXT
data.value: Hi, {0}, that's great to see you here again!

data.name: BIRTH_MONTH_INPUT

data.name: BIRTH_DAY_INPUT
data.value: Success! Next send your birth day

data.name: START_LOCATION_INPUT
data.value: The last one. Send your geoposition, or geoposition of your city. That's important to know your timezone. You have {0} attempts.

data.value: Sorry, seems that there is a format error. Try again, write your birth year, for example 2001

data.name: BIRTH_MONTH_INPUT_ERROR

data.name: NOTIFICATIONS_SETTINGS_INFO
data.value: You can change the parameter how many days before you will get the notifications about your important occasions. You can change it for both types.

data.name: NOTIFICATIONS_SETTINGS_TEXT
data.value: Here you can change notifications settings

data.name: NOTIFICATIONS_SETTINGS_CHANGE_TEXT
data.value: Buttons below represent notifications delay. Press one of them to change it. 0- On this day 3- 3 days before

data.name: LANGUAGE_SETTINGS_TEXT
data.value: Here you can change bot language

data.name: CONFIDENTIALITY_SETTINGS_INFO
data.value: Confidentiality settings are used to close your birth year. There are three variants: *Private - nobody can see your birth year *Mutual - shows only if you are subscribed to each other *Public - shows for everyone

data.name: CONFIDENTIALITY_SETTINGS_TEXT
data.value: Here you can change confidentiality Age confidentiality is {0}

data.name: PROFILE_SETTINGS_TEXT
data.value: Here you can change your profile. Your bitrhdate is {0} Your location is {1}

data.name: NOTIFICATIONS_SETTINGS_CHANGE_INPUT
data.value: Send preferable delay in days. Integer value between 0 and 28

data.name: NOTIFICATIONS_SETTINGS_CHANGE_INPUT_ERROR
data.value: Cannot parse it. Try integer value like 7. It should be between 0 and 28.

data.name: CONFIDENTIALITY_TYPE_INPUT
data.value: Write confidentiality type or choose it from keyboard below.

data.name: HELP_PRIVATE_TEXT
data.value: *What can you do? ğŸ‰ * 1. You can subscribe on your friends with their username, and you will receive notifications before their birthdays. For that check _People_ page. 2. You can manage when you will get notifications by choosing subscription type. You can change type on any existed subscription. Also you can specify how many days before you need to receive notifications in _Settings_ page. 3. If your subscription target doesnâ€™t have Username, or in any other case, you can add subscription through joint chat with this person, this person shared himself to chat-calendar. 4. Even if your friend hasnâ€™t Telegram or this bot, you can invite him, do it :) Or you can add note that doesnâ€™t depend on specific user, but you still will be able to get notifications about it, and even choose subscription type. 5. Except of subscription types settings you also can change your profile confidentiality, language or profile settings such as location or birthdate. *Commands ğŸ“Œ * /calendar â€“ Show your subscriptions/*in chat* shows chat calendar *Security ğŸ›¡ * BirthdayMaster canâ€™t read your chat except commands and telegram messages as â€œNew chat memberâ€ etc. We doesnâ€™t share your private info with any third-party companies. Bot needs your location for understanding your local time. You can hide your age in the settings, in this case only month and day will be available to other bot users.

data.name: CHANGE_LOCATION_INPUT
data.value: Send your location with button below, or send your city name. You have {0} attempt(-s).

data.name: CHATS_TEXT
data.value: Choose joint chat with the preferred person. If you don't see one here, add the bot to this chat and revoke the menu. Actually, this person should add himself to this chat calendar too.

data.name: ADD_PERSONAL_INPUT_NOT_FOUND

data.name: PERSONAL_INVITE_TEXT

data.name: ADDED_TO_CHAT_TEXT
data.value: Hi, I'm BirthdayMaster, and I'm here to help everybody manage birthdaysğŸ. You can add yourself to this chat calendarğŸ“† and others will see you there and even subscribe to you. Also, I will notify you about this important event in this chatğŸ‰ :)

data.name: CHAT_WARNING_TEXT
data.value: âš ï¸It seems that there aren't users who added themself to the calendar. Use the button in the group to join it. You can get it by calling /calendar command in your chat.

data.name: ADDED_USER_TO_CHAT_TEXT
data.value: As I see we have a new member :) Hi, {0}, I'm BirthdayMaster bot and I used to notify about birthdays, even not only in this chat. You can add your birthday to the calendar, or read more about me by sending /help in private chat with me.
